description: '''Season of Ghosts''' (abbreviated '''SoG''') is an electronic metal band formed in 2013 by Greek singer {{ill|Sophia Aslanides|ru|София (певица)}} (also known as Aslanidou), former vocalist of the [[melodic death metal]] band [[Blood Stain Child]]. Season of Ghosts combines metal, [[Trance music|trance]] and [[Electronic music|electronic]] sounds. Formed in [[Tokyo]], Japan, the group has been based in [[London]], England since 2018.
